subject: Baseball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: David Ortiz and Manny Ramirez went about their business after a report that they were among the roughly 100 players to test positive for performance-enhancing drugs in 2003.
snippet: David Ortiz and Manny Ramirez went about their business after a report that they were among the roughly 100 players to test positive for performance-enhancing drugs in 2003.
